title: Google\Cloud\Dialogflow\V2\ConversationModel
name: ConversationModel
description:
Represents a conversation model.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.ConversationModel

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.display_name
params.description: Required. The display name of the model. At most 64 bytes long.

params.name: data.create_time
params.description: Output only. Creation time of this model.

params.name: data.state
params.description: Output only. State of the model. A model can only serve prediction requests after it gets deployed.

params.name: data.language_code
params.description: Language code for the conversation model. If not specified, the language is en-US. Language at ConversationModel should be set for all non en-us languages. This should be a BCP-47 language tag. Example: "en-US".
